title: Can Certain Affinity Reinvigorate Halo Infinite? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.12.22
description:
Tim and Gary talk about Halo Infinite's next move, Bugsnax's big update, and Nintendo's new building!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:29 - Housekeeping

KFW Midday Mayhem episode 2 posts on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays today! Come watch Alanah and Janet battle for the Kinda Funny Twitch Championship!

We’re recording a VERY special Kinda Funny Podcast with Greg and Gen about Portillo today. Catch it live on Patreon at 12:30 pm PT or tomorrow on podcast services.

The Roper Report  -
00:06:35 - Can Certain Affinity Reinvigorate Halo Infinite?
00:27:20 - BugSnax Coming to Everything, DLC Previews
00:33:31 - Ads 00:02:06 - Length
00:35:40 - RIP Vicarious Visions
00:47:57 - Still work to be done on Cyberpunk
00:51:21 - Nintendo is Expanding… its building
01:08:00 - Out today
01:09:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Janet
